_header: Lord that lendest us life and lookest each one lead
Subjects: clothing, against extremes of; women, against
_description: On the follies of fashion — five 7-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Lord þat lenest vs lyf  ant lokest vch an ledeForte cocke
                    wiþ knyf  nast þou none nede…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Þat heo be kud ant kneweFor strompet in rybaudes
                    rewe
BLHar2253.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of MS.
